title: Scrolls
content: rows. Scroll of Fog Cloud Create a cloud of dense fog to Heavily Obscure and Blind creatures within. Creatures cannot make ranged attacks into or out of the fog. Scroll of Shield of Faith Surround a creature with a shimmering field of magic that increases its AC by 2. Scroll of Moonbeam Call down a silvery beam of pale light.
